value:
$nMPID_リリーナ|Treat or trick! No... Trick or treat!$k$pOh, wow! You gave me candy
just for saying that? They must
be magic words!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Lilina, you have to eat something
besides candy.$k$pOh, don't give me those puppy-dog
eyes... Well, it's just one day. I guess
it can't hurt... Right?

$nMPID_リリーナ|Do you want to go to the festival
with me? It'll be a lot of fun! Let's
go!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Jokers be forewarned—try and play
a trick on my darling daughter and
you'll live to rue it!

$nMPID_リリーナ|This costume is so cute! It's all frilly
and fluffy. Will people think I'm cute
too?

$nMPID_ヘクトル|I am Hector, Marquess Ostia. I am
pleased to greet you at this fine
festival! Would you like some candy?

$nMPID_ヘクトル|This may be a festival, but I will
give it my all! The honor of Ostia
demands no less.

$nMPID_リリーナ|I'm doing my best too, Father! I
want to help you!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|I must be having a little too much
fun! It's time to get serious.
$nMPID_リリーナ|For me? Wow! Thanks!

So this is where they're holding
the harvest festival this year?
Count me in—for Lilina's sake!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Enjoying the festival, are you?
My daughter and I are too—
tremendously!$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|It's SO much fun! Why don't they
have a festival every day?$k$p$nMPID_ヘクトル|Ha-ha! If everybody's busy having fun,
who'd grow food? Who'd gather it?
What would we do when it runs out?$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|Oh... I guess the only reason we can
have a festival like this is because
everybody worked so hard!$k$p$nMPID_ヘクトル|That's right. Work hard and enjoy
the rewards—that's what festivals
like this are all about!$k$pI hope you can understand that,
Lilina—if not now, maybe when
you're a little bit older.$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|I'll remember that, Father! I'm
studying hard. I'll make you
proud!
ふんっ！
うおおっ！
You got me...!
F-Father?!
$nMPID_ヘクトル|For all Ostia!
$nMPID_二人|Let's go! This is it!
$nMPID_ヘクトル|Look away, Lilina!
$nMPID_リリーナ|Please retreat!
Both attacking
Lilina... I...
Get them, Father!
All right!

• "All together..."
• "Charge!"

• "Give them..."
• "Strength!"
sigh

• "We're a father-daughter duo, at your service."
• "At your service!"
Umm...
This way, Lilina.
Yes, Father.
$nMPID_リリーナ|Father...?
$nMPID_ヘクトル|Yes? What is it, my dear?
$nMPID_リリーナ|Will that kid come back to play again?

$nMPID_ヘクトル|That...kid? Oh, you mean Eliwood's
boy? Roy? Of course he will!

$nMPID_リリーナ|That's good. I promised to show him
how to study.

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Is that so? Well, that's great, Lilina.
Just what I'd expect from the
daughter of Marquess Ostia!$k$pKeep it up, and you'll be head of the
Lycian League in no time!

$nMPID_リリーナ|The...head? You mean like you,
Father...?
$nMPID_ヘクトル|That's right!

$nMPID_リリーナ|Then...I want to be a good head! We
will be two great heads together!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Ah... I'm sorry, Lilina. There can only
be one leader at a time.$k$pSo, if anything bad happens to your
dear old dad, I'll be counting on you.
$nMPID_リリーナ|Something bad...? Like what?

$nMPID_ヘクトル|W-well, I mean...if I were to get hurt,
for example...very badly...

$nMPID_リリーナ|I don't want you to get hurt! I don't
want to be the head!

$nMPID_ヘクトル|L-listen, Lilina... It's all right. I won't
leave you—not anytime soon.
$nMPID_リリーナ|*snuffle* Promise?

$nMPID_ヘクトル|Of course. It will be a long time
before you must take the lead.$k$pYou will have grown, married...and
I will be a grandfather, surely...

When that time does finally
come, it'll all be up to you.$k$pSo, keep working hard, Lilina—it'll
serve you well in the future.
$nMPID_リリーナ|All right, Father. I'll do my best!
